title: Bordereau reports (premium and claims bordereaux)
dataVerified: Ceding company, reinsurer, policy details, premiums, claims, commissions
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Bordereau status (submitted). Link to ceding company system (reinsurers and auditors, requires authentication)
